title: I Will Avoid The Male Lead and Make My Harem - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Acting   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Calm Protagonist   Child Abuse   Clever Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Nobles   Reverse Harem   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sibling Rivalry   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: Bae Hee Jin   Juitong Saetong   쥐똥새똥
description:
I ignored the word of caution…

And read the high-level, impoverished novel.

But what the hell is up with this crazy author that keeps on harassing the FL!

So I left a review.

I can’t keep reading it because it’s too frustrating—

But then suddenly I possessed the FL, Selina?!

“Pe-people hit me, look at me, I hate it.”

She was stuttering because she was scared.

“It’s your job to satisfy me, Selina. A girl who doesn’t know the her place is not entertaining.”

There were scenes of endless harassment by the tr*shy men.

The moment that thought passed through my head like a flash, I decided.

Let’s avoid the male lead, and kick out the villain!

Bye, everyone! I threw away my destiny and left in search of happiness.>
